forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 2C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 36F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 26F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 36F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 26F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 3C. Winds ENE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 37F. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 3C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 0C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 33F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
